text: Awo olwatuuka Nakkasi Omwamoni11:1 Abamoni baali bazzukulu ba Lutti (Lub 19:38; Ma 2:19). Baali baagezaako dda okulumba Isirayiri ku mirembe gy’abalamuzi (Bal 3:13; 11:4-33) n’ayambuka n’azingiza Yabesugireyaadi. Abasajja bonna ab’e Yabesi ne bamugamba nti, “Kola naffe endagaano, tunaakuweerezanga.”
